name: ufront-mvc
description: MVC Framework that is at the core of ufront.
releasenote:
Switch to new `thx.core` dependency, stop bundling old `thx`.  This may break some code.
Add ServerConsoleLogger that traces to a server console on PHP built in server, Nekotools, and JS.
Fix compilation issues with UfrontConfiguration and TestUtils if not using certain libraries.
